text: Russia participated in 12 editions of the Universiade, debuting at the 1993 Summer Universiade. Since then, Russia has been at the top positions in the medal count, only three times being under the top three. The 2013 Summer Universiade was the best for Russia, beating the previous total medal and gold record of the 1973 Summer Universiade, of the then USSR. Furthermore, Russia produced a number of Universiade records, including the total medals won. Russia hosted the 2013 Summer Universiade in Kazan and the 2019 Winter Universiade in Krasnoyarsk. == Medal count == ===Medals at the Summer Universiade=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%;" |- !Universiade !style="width:4.5em; font-weight:bold;"|20px !style="width:4.5em; font-weight:bold;"|20px !style="width:4.5em; font- weight:bold;"|20px !style="width:4.5em; font-weight:bold;"|40px !style="width:4.5em; font-weight:bold;"|Rank |- |align=left| 1959–1991 || colspan=5| part of USSR |- |align=left| 1993 Buffalo || 0 || 4 || 3 || 7 || 28 |- |align=left| 1995 Fukuoka || 15 || 12 || 23 || 50 || bgcolor=ffdab9| 3 |- |align=left| 1997 Sicily || 10 || 14 || 10 || 34 || 4 |- |align=left| 1999 Palma de Mallorca || 14 || 19 || 11 || 44 || bgcolor=DCE5E5| 2 |- |align=left| 2001 Beijing || 14 || 18 || 21 || 53 || bgcolor=ffdab9| 3 |- |align=left| 2003 Daegu || 26 || 22 || 34 || 82 || bgcolor=DCE5E5| 2 |- |align=left| 2005 Izmir || 26 || 16 || 23 || 65 || bgcolor=F7F6A8| 1 |- |align=left| 2007 Bangkok || 28 || 28 || 39 || 95 || bgcolor=DCE5E5| 2 |- |align=left| 2009 Belgrad || 29 || 22 || 27 || 76 || bgcolor=F7F6A8| 1 |- |align=left| 2011 Shenzhen || 42 || 46 || 45 || 133 || bgcolor=DCE5E5| 2 |- style="border: 3px solid red" |align=left| 2013 Kazan || 155 || 75 || 62 || 292 || bgcolor=F7F6A8| 1 |- |align=left| 2015 Gwangju || 34 || 39 || 47 || 122 || bgcolor=DCE5E5| 2 |- |align=left|23x23px 2017 Taipei || 25 || 31 || 38 || 94 || 4 |- |align=left| 2019 Naples || 22 || 24 || 36 || 82 || bgcolor=DCE5E5| 2 |- |align=left| 2021 Chengdu || || || || || |- style="border: 3px solid red" |align=left| 2023 Yekaterinburg || || || || || |- !
